hero.title: Abay GERD Token
hero.lead: Abay GERD Token distribution is LIVE! Get your hands on 10,000 free GERD tokens and join the financial revolution.

intro.feature_p2: Abay GERD Token (GERD) is a decentralized cryptocurrency inspired by Ethiopia's Grand Renaissance Dam and the Abay River. Built for the world but rooted in Ethiopia, GERD Token honors the people who made the dam possible.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
tokenomics.lead: A sustainable model designed for long-term value and community growth

claim_section.title: Claim Your Share
claim_section.lead: The Abay GERD Token team invites everyone to take part in this historic movement by claiming your free tokens and joining our mission-driven distribution process.
